== Vagamon (628103) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Vagamon is a village in the [[Peerumade]] taluka of [[Idukki ]] district with an area of 7830 hectares and harbouring 3816 households with total population of 14641 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thodupuzha]] is at a distance of 37 km. Male population is 7212 and female population is 7429. Scheduled Caste Population is 3275 and Scheduled Tribes population is 310. Census Location Code of the village is 628103<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
